name: Green monkey-Blanket with Friend
description:
Our Blankets with a Friend features a soft stuffed animal head to be loved, kissed and hugged by your special little one.

This reversible blanket is made with ultra soft minky fabric on one side and cotton flannel on the other side.
Measuring 30x35 inches is the perfect size to tuck around baby when you are out for a stroll.

The Blanket with Friend it is carried everywhere, talked to, cuddle with and becomes their favorite blanket.

Machine wash and dry.
Handmade in Vancouver, Canada

name: Blanket with friend -  purple frog
description:
Babies usually get attached to their blankie and stuffed toys – we combined the best of both worlds. 
The Blanket with a Friend features a soft stuffed animal head to be loved, to be carried everywhere, talked to, cuddle with and to become their favorite blanket.
One side is super soft minky dot  fabric the other side is cotton flannel.
Measures 30”x35”
Machine wash and dry. 

Handmade in Vancouver, Canada

name: Double sided hooded towel -forest green giraffe
description:
The Double Sided Hooded Towels are designed for the modern parent as they are not only a luxurious accessory but will also help your little ones get dry. 
 The outside of the towel is made with super soft melt in your hand fabric called minky the inside is 100% cotton terry.
Dry your little one with the inside towel then you can turn it on the other side for snuggling.
 Perfect for home, swimming- pool and beach.
The hooded towels are generous in size and fit infants through preschool-age kids. 
Measures 30”x40”
The must have Hooded Towel for any fashionable parents and their beautiful child.
Machine wash warm and tumble dry low.
Handmade in Vancouver,Canada

name: Cars (turquoise)hooded towel
description:
Our towels  hood  won’t flop to cover your child’s face.
The hood is double sided for extra absorbency and cuteness. It also has an elephant embroidered in the front of the hood.
Taking the time to enjoy the sweet smell of a fresh-from-the-bath baby are precious moments. And it's especially good when the baby is wrapped up and snug in a soft cotton towel. 
The hooded towels are generous in size and fit infants through preschool-age kids. 
Measures 30”x40”
100% cotton
Machine wash warm and tumble dry low.
Handmade in Vancouver, Canada

name: Mini Security Blanket /Lovie -frog
description:
The mini security blanket is perfect for little ones to carry around, to hug and be comforted by - a great gift for newborns. 
Easy for small fingers to grasp, it often becomes a loyal companion throughout childhood.
Made with soft minky and cotton flannel.
Machine wash and dry.

Funny and  fabulous baby droolin' bibs are made with soft minky fabric and backed with  cotton flannel for absorption. 
Machine wash and dry.
Handmade in Vancouver, Canada

name: Tooth fairy Pillow peach
description:
A loose tooth... is a big event! Make it special with one of our cute tooth fairy pillows. 
Our tooth fairy pillows are created in dreamy colour combinations for boys and girls. 
Machine wash and dry.
Handmade in Vancouver, Canada
